SEARCH
Module group75
Package model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
model.Game
public class Game extends Object
This class represents a game. It keeps track of the player, timer, play stats. It provides functionality for staring a new game, saving a game, loading a game, and parental options.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Constructs new Game instance.

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Start the game by setting isRunning to true and starting the timer.

    • stopGame

      public void stopGame()
      Stop the game if it is running by stopping the timer and setting isRunning to false. Then update the play time variables to include the time played in this session.

    • createNewPet

      public boolean createNewPet(String petName, String petType)
      Creates a new pet of the specifed type with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      petName - name to assign to the pet.
      petType - type to assign to the pet.
      Returns:
      true if the pet was successfull created and false otherwise.

    • getExistingPetIDs

      public List<Integer> getExistingPetIDs()
      Searches the pets files to get all the existing pet IDs.
      Returns:
      a list of existing pet IDs.

    • getAvailablePets

      public Map<Integer,String> getAvailablePets()
      Gets a mapping of pet IDs to pet names for display in load game UI -- used in UI to show available save slots/pets
      Returns:
      a mapping of pet IDs to pet names.

    • getAlivePets

      public Map<Integer,String> getAlivePets()
      Gets a mapping of only alive pet IDs to pet names for display in load game UI
      Returns:
      a mapping of the living pet IDs to pet names.

    • getDeadPets

      public Map<Integer,String> getDeadPets()
      Gets a mapping of only dead pet IDs to pet names for display
      Returns:
      a mapping of dead pet IDs to pet names.

    • savePet

      public boolean savePet()
      Saves current pet's state and inventory to a file.
      Returns:
      true if the pet was saved successfully and false otherwise.

    • loadPet

      public boolean loadPet(int petID)
      Loads the pet's data from the save file and initializes the pet and inventory.

      This method reads the pet's attributes, state, and inventory items from a save file based on the given pet ID. It checks if the pet can be loaded based on the time restrictions. The loading fails if the pet type is not recognized or the file cannot be found.

      Parameters:
      petID - the unique identifier of the pet to be loaded
      Returns:
      true if the pet was successfull loaded and false otherwise.

    • revivePet

      public boolean revivePet(int petID)
      Revives the pet by resting all its stats.

      If the pet cannot be loaded or the pet is null, the revival fails. If the pet is revived, the timer is started.

      Parameters:
      petID -
      Returns:
      true if the pet was revived successfully and false otherwise.

    • isWithinAllowedTime

      public boolean isWithinAllowedTime()
      Checks if the player is within the allowed play time if restrictions are enabled.
      Returns:
      true if the player is within their allowed play time and false otherwise.

    • updateParentalControls

      public void updateParentalControls(boolean enabled, int start, int end, String password)
      Updates the parental controls based on the specified values.
      Parameters:
      enabled - boolean value representing whether parental controls are enabled.
      start - the start hour for allowed play time.
      end - the end hour for allowed play time.
      password - the parental control password.

    • resetPlayTimeStats

      public void resetPlayTimeStats()
      Resets the play time statistics.

      Each play time variable (totalPlayTime, lastSessionTime, sessionCount) will be set to 0.

    • verifyParentPassword

      public boolean verifyParentPassword(String password)
      Check if the specified password is equal to the parental control password.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to be checked against the parental control password.
      Returns:
      true if the specified password is not null and is equal to the parental control password and false otherwise.

    • isActionOnCooldown

      public boolean isActionOnCooldown(String action)
      Check if the specified action is on cooldown or if it can be preformed.
      Parameters:
      action - the name of the action to check.
      Returns:
      true is the action is on cooldown and false otherwise.

    • getRemainingCooldown

      public long getRemainingCooldown(String action)
      Gets the remaining cooldown time of the specifed action.
      Parameters:
      action - the action to check the remaining cooldown for.
      Returns:
      the remaining cooldown time in milliseconds, or 0 if action is not on cooldown.

    • setActionCooldown

      public void setActionCooldown(String action)
      Sets a cooldown time for the specifed action.
      Parameters:
      action - the name of the action to set the cooldown for.

      Clears the current pet assigned to the player.
